mapper.sql: select MEETINGS_RESEARCH_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, MEETINGS_TYPE, MEETINGS_NAME, MEETINGS_TIME, VENUE, PARTICIPANTS_ID, PARTICIPANTS_NAME, MEETINGS_CONTENT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, ENT_ID, APPROVER_ID, APPROVER_NAME, APPROVAL_FLAG from inspection_meetings_research
mapper.select: select u.UNITS_ID,u.ORG_ID,u.ORG_NAME,u.created_time,count(d.UNITS_ID) as count from inspection_units u left join inspection_meetings_research d on u.UNITS_ID = d.UNITS_ID where u.plan_id = #{planId} group by u.UNITS_ID

select MEETINGS_RESEARCH_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, MEETINGS_TYPE, MEETINGS_NAME, MEETINGS_TIME, VENUE, PARTICIPANTS_ID, PARTICIPANTS_NAME, MEETINGS_CONTENT, r.CREATED_BY as 'r.CREATED_BY', r.CREATED_TIME as 'r.CREATED_TIME', r.UPDATED_BY as 'r.UPDATED_BY', r.UPDATED_TIME as 'r.UPDATED_TIME', r.ENT_ID as 'r.ENT_ID', APPROVER_ID, APPROVER_NAME, APPROVAL_FLAG, doc.PIIS_DOC_ID, doc.OBJECT_ID, doc.FILE_DICT_ID, doc.FILE_NAME, doc.FILE_SIZE, doc.FILE_PATH from inspection_meetings_research r left join piis_document doc on concat('MeetingsResearch', R.MEETINGS_RESEARCH_ID) = doc.OBJECT_ID where MEETINGS_RESEARCH_ID = #{meetingsResearchId}
